card.name: Aerial Maneuver
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you put all of yourself into an attack, without fear or hesitation, in that instant you may attain greatness."—Predak, Gateless freemage

card.name: Angelic Edict
card.property: Exile target creature or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Boros built a prison in the sky where Azorius statutes couldn't restrict their sense of justice.

card.name: Angelic Skirmisher
card.property: Flying At the beginning of each combat, choose first strike, vigilance, or lifelink. Creatures you control gain that ability until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A keen mind wields an army as a deft hand wields a sword."

card.name: Assault Griffin
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic offer a prize to any biomancer who can breed a krasis to match a griffin in the air. It's never been claimed."—Libuse, Boros sergeant

card.name: Basilica Guards
card.property: Defender Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

card.name: Blind Obedience
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."

card.name: Boros Elite
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Boros Elite and at least two other creatures attack, Boros Elite gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First, you must fight among the rank and file. It is there I will discern your skills as a leader."—Aurelia, to Gideon Jura

card.name: Court Street Denizen
card.property: Whenever another white creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Boros fight for justice. The Azorius fight for law. I hold the line between, and make sure the people are given both."

card.name: Daring Skyjek
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Daring Skyjek and at least two other creatures attack, Daring Skyjek gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hard part isn't landing in the saddle. The hard part is leaping before you see it."

card.name: Debtor's Pulpit
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Tap target creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may not be able to pay. But you can still kneel."—Milana, Orzhov prelate

card.name: Dutiful Thrull
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Dutiful Thrull.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are useful, but there's little satisfaction in supplication that throws itself under your heel."—Jozica, Orzhov enforcer

card.name: Frontline Medic
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Frontline Medic and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. Sacrifice Frontline Medic: Counter target spell with {X} in its mana cost unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Gideon, Champion of Justice
card.property: +1: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls. 0: Until end of turn, Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes a Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him and gains indestructible. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. −15: Exile all other permanents.

card.name: Guardian of the Gateless
card.property: Flying Guardian of the Gateless can block any number of creatures. Whenever Guardian of the Gateless blocks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature it's blocking.

card.name: Guildscorn Ward
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from multicolored.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Gateless have risen. The Ten shall fall."—Ninth District graffiti

card.name: Hold the Gates
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+1 for each Gate you control and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We grew up on these streets. We know them better than any Boros grunt from Zelzo."

card.name: Holy Mantle
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The guilds promise to provide safety. I prefer to make my own."—Briska, Ninth District freemage

card.name: Knight of Obligation
card.property: Vigilance Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He can calculate interest to six decimal places even in the midst of a deadly duel.

card.name: Knight Watch
card.property: Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We lost respect after the battle for Barbu Rooftop. Send the troops to mingle respectfully with the citizens."—Commander Yaszen of Boros

card.name: Luminate Primordial
card.property: Vigilance When Luminate Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target creature that player controls and that player gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Murder Investigation
card.property: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature dies, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every death has a web of consequences. Our job is to find the spider."

card.name: Nav Squad Commandos
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Nav Squad Commandos and at least two other creatures attack, Nav Squad Commandos gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Funded by the Azorius to keep current maps of the undercity, the Boros nav squads survey even the most unsavory areas.

card.name: Righteous Charge
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the name of peace, moderation, and decency—wipe them all out!"

card.name: Shielded Passage
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet delved into the depths of Ravnica's past, and Selesnya followed without fear.

card.name: Smite
card.property: Destroy target blocked creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sure, today of all days, he asked to borrow my boots!"—Darijo, Ivy Street ruffian

card.name: Syndic of Tithes
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Entrance is free. Donations are required."—Notice outside Vizkopa Bank

card.name: Urbis Protector
card.property: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear that Boros is losing its angels to the Gateless Movement. I'm sure this comes as no surprise to you."—Teysa, to Lazav

card.name: Zarichi Tiger
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}: You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The taming and consecration of these creatures is evidence of our faith."—Resimir, Zarichi Temple priest

card.name: Aetherize
card.property: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can come back once you've learned some manners—and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

card.name: Agoraphobia
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -5/-0. {2}{U}: Return Agoraphobia to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone in this city is choosing sides. I choose inside."

card.name: Clinging Anemones
card.property: Defender Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Cloudfin Raptor
card.property: Flying Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Diluvian Primordial
card.property: Flying When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a card cast this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Enter the Infinite
card.property: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't just have an idea—have all of them."—Niv-Mizzet

card.name: Frilled Oculus
card.property: {1} {G}: Frilled Oculus gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Understand the Simic? That's about as easy as winning a staring contest with a homunculus."—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

card.name: Gridlock
card.property: Tap X target nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One tiny peg pulled from a single wagon wheel, and an entire district grinds to a halt."—Lazav

card.name: Hands of Binding
card.property: Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Incursion Specialist
card.property: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Incursion Specialist gets +2/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Work for the Dimir again? That depends. Tell me more about this maze."

card.name: Keymaster Rogue
card.property: Keymaster Rogue can't be blocked. When Keymaster Rogue enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This one opens the grate outside Zelzo Base. This one is for Ismeri Library. This one is for an invisible door . . . No, I've said too much."

card.name: Last Thoughts
card.property: Draw a card. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Leyline Phantom
card.property: When Leyline Phantom deals combat damage, return it to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it survived combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is the maze itself a phantom? Or is one as real as the other? Perhaps I am as mad as the dragon."—Jace Beleren, journal

card.name: Metropolis Sprite
card.property: Flying {U}: Metropolis Sprite gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, if that goblin didn't want his tongue pierced, he shouldn't have stuck it out at me."

card.name: Mindeye Drake
card.property: Flying When Mindeye Drake dies, target player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They can map both the cityscape and the minds of its architects.

card.name: Rapid Hybridization
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've merged your life essence with that of several creatures at once. You're welcome."—Speaker Trifon

card.name: Realmwright
card.property: As Realmwright enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Lands you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is not a single inch of Ravnica that hasn't been altered at one point or another to fit someone's whims.

card.name: Sage's Row Denizen
card.property: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I offer you wisdom untainted by false loyalty, learning free of any guild's agenda."

card.name: Sapphire Drake
card.property: Flying Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sapphire drakes can communicate over great distances, their calls resonating in the gems fixed in their skulls.

card.name: Scatter Arc
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Should your chosen emissary be able to fluctuate triharmonic pentodes, however unlikely, I shall shunt excess negavolt radicals."

card.name: Simic Fluxmage
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {1}{U}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from Simic Fluxmage onto target creature.

card.name: Simic Manipulator
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {T}, Remove one or more +1/+1 counters from Simic Manipulator: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of +1/+1 counters removed this way.

card.name: Skygames
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Both Boros and Azorius scout the games in hopes of recruiting the finest athletes.

card.name: Spell Rupture
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like water, mana will drain from an inferior vessel."—Jalan Tosk, Simic forcemage

card.name: Stolen Identity
card.property: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Totally Lost
card.property: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Voidwalk
card.property: Exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Way of the Thief
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature can't be blocked as long as you control a Gate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A true shortcut isn't a way other people don't know; it's a way other people can't go.

card.name: Balustrade Spy
card.property: Flying When Balustrade Spy enters the battlefield, target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Basilica Screecher
card.property: Flying Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A screech in the night is all it takes for Orzhov debtors to clutch at their coin purses.

card.name: Contaminated Ground
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Swamp. Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one cares about pollution until they can see it."—Gurras, Golgari rot farmer

card.name: Corpse Blockade
card.property: Defender Sacrifice another creature: Corpse Blockade gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are laws against it, but the dead have no one to complain to and the living are too frightened to investigate.

card.name: Crypt Ghast
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add {B} to your mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

card.name: Death's Approach
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's cold in the grave, and the dead crave your warmth. Who are you to deny them?"—Strava, Dimir mage

card.name: Devour Flesh
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature, then gains life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His twisted mind concluded that if he was what he ate, and he wanted to stay human, . . .

card.name: Dying Wish
card.property: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature dies, target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wish I could rewrite my every deed and kill you with my first breath instead of my last."

card.name: Gateway Shade
card.property: {B}: Gateway Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Tap an untapped Gate you control: Gateway Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tireless and merciless, shades are harnessed as spies by the Dimir.

card.name: Grisly Spectacle
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head."—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Upon finding his warehouse infested, Gaven didn't know whether to get an exterminator or an exorcist.

card.name: Horror of the Dim
card.property: {U}: Horror of the Dim gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lesser minds can scarcely imagine such a marriage of necromancy and mind magic."—Strava, Dimir mage

card.name: Illness in the Ranks
card.property: Creature tokens get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Selesnya denied us tribute. Let's show them the error of their ways."—Milana, Orzhov prelate

card.name: Killing Glare
card.property: Destroy target creature with power X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A casual glance into a dark corner may be your last.

card.name: Lord of the Void
card.property: Flying Whenever Lord of the Void deals combat damage to a player, exile the top seven cards of that player's library, then put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Mental Vapors
card.property: Target player discards a card. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Midnight Recovery
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Ogre Slumlord
card.property: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token. Rats you control have deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too."—Branko One-Ear

card.name: Sepulchral Primordial
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) When Sepulchral Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Shadow Alley Denizen
card.property: Whenever another black creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

card.name: Shadow Slice
card.property: Target opponent loses 3 life. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Slate Street Ruffian
card.property: Whenever Slate Street Ruffian becomes blocked, defending player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Merciless to the point of psychosis. Let's give him a job."—Zelinas, Orzhov recruiter

card.name: Smog Elemental
card.property: Flying Creatures with flying your opponents control get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The skies used to be my refuge, a place of peace away from the chaos below. Now, with every flight, death seems to follow me like a shadow."—Writings of Cica, Skyjek scout

card.name: Syndicate Enforcer
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the darkest corners of Ravnica still lie in the shadow of the Church.

card.name: Thrull Parasite
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) {T}, Pay 2 life: Remove a counter from target nonland permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hunger of a vampire and the subtlety of a tax collector.

card.name: Undercity Informer
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Scandal and slander are never welcome news. That's why I'm never the messenger."

card.name: Undercity Plague
card.property: Target player loses 1 life, discards a card, then sacrifices a permanent. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Wight of Precinct Six
card.property: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

card.name: Act of Treason
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each day uncertainty and rumors spread, and each night attendance at the Juri Revue increases.

card.name: Bomber Corps
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Bomber Corps and at least two other creatures attack, Bomber Corps deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Cinder Elemental
card.property: {X} {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: Cinder Elemental deals X damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The old gods awoke and sent fingers of fire to see what was left of the old ways under the endless city."—Daiva, Gruul storyteller

card.name: Crackling Perimeter
card.property: Tap an untapped Gate you control: Crackling Perimeter deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the path he sought came into focus, Niv-Mizzet took steps to prevent others from approaching it.

card.name: Ember Beast
card.property: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions—none of them willingly.

card.name: Firefist Striker
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Firefist Striker and at least two other creatures attack, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flaming fist of Boros holds the promise of both protection and destruction in its grasp.

card.name: Five-Alarm Fire
card.property: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, put a blaze counter on Five-Alarm Fire. Remove five blaze counters from Five-Alarm Fire: Five-Alarm Fire deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Foundry Street Denizen
card.property: Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Foundry Street riot, Arrester Hulbein tried to ban bludgeons. Which, inevitably, resulted in another riot.

card.name: Furious Resistance
card.property: Target blocking creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At least the Gateless rebels have ideals. Rakdos just mocks, defiles, and kills all we hold dear."—Libuse, Boros sergeant

card.name: Hellkite Tyrant
card.property: Flying, trample Whenever Hellkite Tyrant deals combat damage to a player, gain control of all artifacts that player controls. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more artifacts, you win the game.

card.name: Hellraiser Goblin
card.property: Creatures you control have haste and attack each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't let him lead the soldiers, but by all means let him lead the way.

card.name: Homing Lightning
card.property: Homing Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature and each other creature with the same name as that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see countless worlds. What makes them think I can't find them in just one?"—Ral Zarek

card.name: Legion Loyalist
card.property: Haste Battalion — Whenever Legion Loyalist and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain first strike and trample until end of turn and can't be blocked by creature tokens this turn.

card.name: Madcap Skills
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The larger the crowd, the harder it is for them to run away.

card.name: Mark for Death
card.property: Target creature an opponent controls blocks this turn if able. Untap that creature. Other creatures that player controls can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everyone roots for the little guy, but nobody bets on him.

card.name: Massive Raid
card.property: Massive Raid deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Boros lack vision. Give them a convenient scapegoat and they'll be blind to the true threats."—Lazav

card.name: Molten Primordial
card.property: Haste When Molten Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature that player controls until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Mugging
card.property: Mugging deals 2 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scream: muffled. Pockets: emptied. Neck function: never the same again.

card.name: Ripscale Predator
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Ravnica's wilds expanded, even advocates for nature had to confront fiercer natural threats.

card.name: Scorchwalker
card.property: Bloodrush — {1}{R}{R}, Discard Scorchwalker: Target attacking creature gets +5/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Borborygmos's elemental launched an assault, but the Izzet wards held and experiments continue."—Skyknight report on the Rubblebelt

card.name: Skinbrand Goblin
card.property: Bloodrush — {R}, Discard Skinbrand Goblin: Target attacking creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These Gruul skin-runes—discern whether their patterns evoke streets, leylines, or both. You have four days."—Niv-Mizzet, to his assistant

card.name: Skullcrack
card.property: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn. Skullcrack deals 3 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lawmage's argument was clever and well reasoned, but Blunk's response proved irrefutable.

card.name: Structural Collapse
card.property: Target player sacrifices an artifact and a land. Structural Collapse deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Gruul holiday of Rauck-Chauv always ends the same way.

card.name: Tin Street Market
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes I stroll along Tin Street and watch citizens busy with their daily lives. It reminds me why I do my job."—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

card.name: Towering Thunderfist
card.property: {W}: Towering Thunderfist gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing ruins a party like one of those big killjoys bursting through the door and setting all the guests free."—Ruba, Rakdos cultist

card.name: Viashino Shanktail
card.property: First strike Bloodrush — {2}{R}, Discard Viashino Shanktail: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Slizt Clan's battle cry is an impressive display of fury, defiance, and spit.

card.name: Warmind Infantry
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Warmind Infantry and at least two other creatures attack, Warmind Infantry gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before Aurelia denounced Niv-Mizzet, the two guilds had collaborated on the Warmind Initiative in pursuit of the ultimate soldier.

card.name: Wrecking Ogre
card.property: Double strike Bloodrush — {3}{R}{R}, Discard Wrecking Ogre: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 and gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If no opponent can be found, ogres of the Bolrac Clan will often pick fights with buildings.

card.name: Adaptive Snapjaw
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Alpha Authority
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has hexproof and can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the bitterest enemies of the Burning-Tree Clan respect the strength of Borborygmos's rule.

card.name: Burst of Strength
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our fight is not about territory or revenge. It is about freedom, plain and simple."—Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

card.name: Crocanura
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Crowned Ceratok
card.property: Trample Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

card.name: Disciple of the Old Ways
card.property: {R}: Disciple of the Old Ways gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Selesnya thinks nature is a pretty plaything. True nature would rip their faces off and wear their skins as trophies."

card.name: Experiment One
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One.

card.name: Forced Adaptation
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're planting the seeds of change. Sometimes, we plant them in people."—Vorel of the Hull Clade

card.name: Giant Adephage
card.property: Trample Whenever Giant Adephage deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Giant Adephage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To a creature like that, we must seem like, well, bugs."—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

card.name: Greenside Watcher
card.property: {T}: Untap target Gate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Izzet may incite war, but my duty is here. I will not abandon the wild."

card.name: Gyre Sage
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each +1/+1 counter on Gyre Sage.

card.name: Hindervines
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with no +1/+1 counters on them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Woodlands and laws. Both grow faster than the Azorius's ability to manage them."—Suniel the Woodwise

card.name: Ivy Lane Denizen
card.property: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Skyknight gear? Well, I have drake-skin gauntlets, supple and fireproof. Or a ceratok chestplate that'll stop a crossbow bolt."

card.name: Miming Slime
card.property: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We paid the Simic very well for this capability, but we should quickly recoup our expenses in saved wages."—Milana, Orzhov prelate

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And if you threaten me again, your shiny steel trousers will be sprouting daggerthorn vines."—Iveta, rooftop runner

card.name: Ooze Flux
card.property: {1} {G}, Remove one or more +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters removed this way.

card.name: Predator's Rapport
card.property: Choose target creature you control. You gain life equal to that creature's power plus its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Other guilds say the Gruul are savages, no better than the beasts we live with. I say we've found friends who won't stab us in the back."—Domri Rade

card.name: Rust Scarab
card.property: Whenever Rust Scarab becomes blocked, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Behold nature's answer to the problem of society."—Nikya of the Old Ways

card.name: Scab-Clan Charger
card.property: Bloodrush — {1}{G}, Discard Scab-Clan Charger: Target attacking creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only roads I wish to see are those beaten flat by wild hooves."

card.name: Serene Remembrance
card.property: Shuffle Serene Remembrance and up to three target cards from a single graveyard into their owners' libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While Lazav schemed and Niv-Mizzet researched, Trostani sought the future in the whispers of the past.

card.name: Skarrg Goliath
card.property: Trample Bloodrush — {5}{G}{G}, Discard Skarrg Goliath: Target attacking creature gets +9/+9 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They bind us with their laws. We free ourselves with nature's fist."—Nikya of the Old Ways

card.name: Slaughterhorn
card.property: Bloodrush — {G}, Discard Slaughterhorn: Target attacking creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov clergy would never cross its path, but sending thrull couriers to do so is cheap and entertaining.

card.name: Spire Tracer
card.property: Spire Tracer can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cartographers on Ravnica chart not just the horizontal, but also the vertical.

card.name: Sylvan Primordial
card.property: Reach When Sylvan Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, destroy target noncreature permanent that player controls. For each permanent destroyed this way, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Tower Defense
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+5 and gain reach until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The drakes are practice. We may one day need to bring down a sky swallower, or maybe even Rakdos himself."—Korun Nar, Rubblebelt hunter

card.name: Verdant Haven
card.property: Enchant land When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

card.name: Wasteland Viper
card.property: Deathtouch Bloodrush — {G}, Discard Wasteland Viper: Target attacking creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Gruul embrace all things poisonous and living in the cracks of society."—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

card.name: Wildwood Rebirth
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Ravnica, there are maladies far more difficult to treat than death.

card.name: Alms Beast
card.property: Creatures blocking or blocked by Alms Beast have lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Alms-coins are only redeemable at Orzhov businesses.

card.name: Assemble the Legion
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on Assemble the Legion. Then create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste for each muster counter on Assemble the Legion.

card.name: Aurelia, the Warleader
card.property: Flying, vigilance, haste Whenever Aurelia, the Warleader attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where Razia was aloof and untouchable, Aurelia is on the frontlines, calling for war.

card.name: Aurelia's Fury
card.property: Aurelia's Fury deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Tap each creature dealt damage this way. Players dealt damage this way can't cast noncreature spells this turn.

card.name: Bane Alley Broker
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at cards exiled with Bane Alley Broker. {U}{B}, {T}: Return a card exiled with Bane Alley Broker to its owner's hand.

card.name: Biovisionary
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if you control four or more creatures named Biovisionary, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He tired of his fellow researchers and their useless prattling, so he decided to make a network of scholars with whom he could carry a conversation.

card.name: Borborygmos Enraged
card.property: Trample Whenever Borborygmos Enraged deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Discard a land card: Borborygmos Enraged deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Boros Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player. • Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn. • Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Practice compassion and mercy. But know when they must end."—Aurelia

card.name: Call of the Nightwing
card.property: Create a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Cartel Aristocrat
card.property: Sacrifice another creature: Cartel Aristocrat gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life serves a higher purpose now: ensuring the continuation of my own."

card.name: Clan Defiance
card.property: Choose one or more — • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature with flying. • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature without flying. • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target player.

card.name: Consuming Aberration
card.property: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards. Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Deathpact Angel
card.property: Flying When Deathpact Angel dies, create a 1/1 white and black Cleric creature token. It has "{3}{W}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return a card named Deathpact Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield."

card.name: Dimir Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target sorcery spell. • Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. • Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.

card.name: Dinrova Horror
card.property: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits."—Sign outside Dinrova Building

card.name: Domri Rade
card.property: +1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. −2: Target creature you control fights another target creature. −7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."

card.name: Drakewing Krasis
card.property: Flying, trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cautious not to repeat Vig's mistakes, the Simic fuse life essences using magic alone. Each result is called a krasis.

card.name: Duskmantle Guildmage
Duskmantle Seer
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of his or her library, loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost, then puts it into his or her hand.

card.name: Elusive Krasis
card.property: Elusive Krasis can't be blocked. Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Executioner's Swing
card.property: Target creature that dealt damage this turn gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The contract specified an appendage for a missed payment. Read the fine print: the head is an appendage."

card.name: Fathom Mage
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

card.name: Firemane Avenger
card.property: Flying Battalion — Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Firemane Nevena led the victorious assault on the Barbu Rooftop rebels. Now the Gateless have marked her for death.

card.name: Fortress Cyclops
card.property: Whenever Fortress Cyclops attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Fortress Cyclops blocks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They think they tamed him, but he will always be a wild titan, a force of nature."—Nedja, Gruul shaman

card.name: Foundry Champion
card.property: When Foundry Champion enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of creatures you control. {R}: Foundry Champion gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {W}: Foundry Champion gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Frenzied Tilling
card.property: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Izzet contraptions pollute our lands. Burn them down, kill the makers, cleanse the earth."—Nedja, Gruul shaman

card.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
card.property: Trample Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

card.name: Ground Assault
card.property: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing."—Narbulg Nine Fingers

card.name: Gruul Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Creatures without flying can't block this turn. • Gain control of all permanents you own. • Gruul Charm deals 3 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Gruul Ragebeast
card.property: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the other guilds want a war, they should know we've been ready the whole time."—Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

card.name: High Priest of Penance
card.property: Whenever High Priest of Penance is dealt damage, you may destroy target nonland permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All I require is faith, loyalty, obedience, trust, and complete and utter devotion."

card.name: Hydroform
card.property: Target land becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While the sea may be our home, the sky is our destiny."—Prime Speaker Zegana

card.name: Kingpin's Pet
card.property: Flying Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Debt and death sound so similar, and thrulls are so hard of hearing. Mistakes are inevitable."—Milana, Orzhov prelate

card.name: Lazav, Dimir Mastermind
card.property: Hexproof Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may have Lazav, Dimir Mastermind become a copy of that card, except its name is still Lazav, Dimir Mastermind, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it gains hexproof and this ability.

card.name: Martial Glory
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, Boros tactics are unparalleled. But when your comrades are dying around you, inner strength must carry the day."—Gideon Jura, to Aurelia

card.name: Master Biomancer
card.property: Each other creature you control enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to Master Biomancer's power and as a Mutant in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is a wonderful engineer but works far too slowly for my tastes."

card.name: Merciless Eviction
card.property: Choose one — • Exile all artifacts. • Exile all creatures. • Exile all enchantments. • Exile all planeswalkers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I once saw the Obzedat moved to action. Since that day, I've been thankful that they're mainly lazy, and dead."—Aurelia, to Gideon Jura

card.name: Mind Grind
card.property: Each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals X land cards, then puts all cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard. X can't be 0.

card.name: Mortus Strider
card.property: When Mortus Strider dies, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dimir's best agents hide from death itself.

card.name: Mystic Genesis
card.property: Counter target spell. Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic can grow anything out of a puddle of sludge. I just hope they never join forces with the Golgari."—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

card.name: Nimbus Swimmer
card.property: Flying Nimbus Swimmer enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic soon discovered that the sky offered as few constraints on size as the sea.

card.name: Obzedat, Ghost Council
card.property: When Obzedat, Ghost Council enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. At the beginning of your end step, you may exile Obzedat. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.

card.name: One Thousand Lashes
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 1 life.

card.name: Ordruun Veteran
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Ordruun Veteran and at least two other creatures attack, Ordruun Veteran gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My father was Gruul, but I chose the precision of the legion over the fury of the pack."

card.name: Orzhov Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Return target creature you control and all Auras you control attached to it to their owner's hand. • Destroy target creature and you lose life equal to its toughness. • Return target creature card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Paranoid Delusions
card.property: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Primal Visitation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul shamans believe all sentient beings have the soul of savagery inside them, an animal form clawing to escape.

card.name: Prime Speaker Zegana
card.property: Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among other creatures you control. When Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to its power.

card.name: Psychic Strike
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Until more information could be gleaned about Niv-Mizzet's intentions, Lazav took every opportunity to stall his experiments.

card.name: Purge the Profane
card.property: Target opponent discards two cards and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov hear the plans of the other guilds through the guilty thoughts of the disloyal.

card.name: Rubblehulk
card.property: Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the architects of Ravnica claim a structure will stand against a wurm, they never mention for how long.

card.name: Shambleshark
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Signal the Clans
card.property: Search your library for three creature cards and reveal them. If you reveal three cards with different names, choose one of them at random and put that card into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul clanfolk obey few rules, but all feel bound to answer the call of the horn.

card.name: Simic Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. • Permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. • Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We measure our progress in heartbeats."—Prime Speaker Zegana

card.name: Skarrg Guildmage
Skyknight Legionnaire
card.property: Flying, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Millennium Platform, once a monument to peace, was quickly seized by the skyknights for its strategic aerial location.

card.name: Soul Ransom
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only any opponent may activate this ability.

card.name: Spark Trooper
card.property: Trample, lifelink, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Trooper.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet-designed conductors atop Sunhome charge empty sets of armor that give form to the fluctuating elementals.

card.name: Sunhome Guildmage
Treasury Thrull
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever Treasury Thrull attacks, you may return target artifact, creature, or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Truefire Paladin
card.property: Vigilance {R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Unexpected Results
card.property: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield and return Unexpected Results to its owner's hand.

card.name: Urban Evolution
card.property: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

card.name: Vizkopa Confessor
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) When Vizkopa Confessor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. Target opponent reveals that many cards from his or her hand. You choose one of them and exile it.

card.name: Vizkopa Guildmage
Whispering Madness
card.property: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Wojek Halberdiers
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Wojek Halberdiers and at least two other creatures attack, Wojek Halberdiers gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tired of Boros interference, the Rakdos unleashed hellraiser goblins, hoping their corpses would weigh down the halberds.

card.name: Zameck Guildmage
Zhur-Taa Swine
card.property: Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Zhur-Taa Swine: Target attacking creature gets +5/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gurley was the first to domesticate one, though his widow didn't take much solace in that accomplishment.

card.name: Arrows of Justice
card.property: Arrows of Justice deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Archers from the Horizon Military Academy hone their skills by targeting pickpockets blocks away.

card.name: Beckon Apparition
card.property: Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The foyer is littered with the coins it demands but can no longer hold.

card.name: Biomass Mutation
card.property: Creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A regression to ancient forms? A glimpse of future evolutions? Or a fleeting alteration of the present?"—Vorel of the Hull Clade

card.name: Bioshift
card.property: Move any number of +1/+1 counters from target creature onto another target creature with the same controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's all right if you change your mind. There's always a chance we can rearrange parts later."—Zija, Simic mutationist

card.name: Boros Reckoner
card.property: Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player. {R/W}: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Imagine a thunderstorm that's also a tactical genius. That's him."—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

card.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
card.property: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

card.name: Coerced Confession
card.property: Target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. You draw a card for each creature card put into that graveyard this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ask the right questions in the right way and truth is inevitable."—Lazav

card.name: Deathcult Rogue
card.property: Deathcult Rogue can't be blocked except by Rogues.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hussars can't catch him, and he evades our traps with ease. I fear he walks unseen even in the halls of New Prahv."—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

card.name: Gift of Orzhova
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember by whose gift you ascend."—Milana, Orzhov prelate

card.name: Immortal Servitude
card.property: Return each creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fine print of countless contracts has ensured we are never defenseless."—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

card.name: Merfolk of the Depths
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When giant sinkholes opened across Ravnica, they revealed buried oceans and the merfolk, once thought to be extinct.

card.name: Nightveil Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Nightveil Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library. You may play cards exiled with Nightveil Specter.

card.name: Pit Fight
card.property: Target creature you control fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the coins in Ravnica can't save his soul now."—Narbulg Nine Fingers

card.name: Rubblebelt Raiders
card.property: Whenever Rubblebelt Raiders attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each attacking creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This city will perish, and the Gruul will cheer as the boar-god crushes the last bricks into dust."—Nikya of the Old Ways

card.name: Shattering Blow
card.property: Exile target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aurelia seems too eager to solve her problems by delivering them to oblivion."—Prime Speaker Zegana

card.name: Armored Transport
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Armored Transport by creatures blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If only our jails were as secure."—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

card.name: Boros Keyrune
card.property: {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. {R}{W}: Boros Keyrune becomes a 1/1 red and white Soldier artifact creature with double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

card.name: Dimir Keyrune
card.property: {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. {U}{B}: Dimir Keyrune becomes a 2/2 blue and black Horror artifact creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A key that slips through every lock.

card.name: Glaring Spotlight
card.property: Creatures your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof. {3}, Sacrifice Glaring Spotlight: Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Gruul Keyrune
card.property: {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. {R}{G}: Gruul Keyrune becomes a 3/2 red and green Beast artifact creature with trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As perilous and unpredictable as the wilds themselves.

card.name: Illusionist's Bracers
card.property: Whenever an ability of equipped creature is activated, if it isn't a mana ability, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easy to believe you're a god when you're twice as powerful as everyone else.

card.name: Millennial Gargoyle
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've got to keep your wits about you on the roofs. Not all stones are compliant handholds."—Iveta, rooftop runner

card.name: Orzhov Keyrune
card.property: {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. {W}{B}: Orzhov Keyrune becomes a 1/4 white and black Thrull artifact creature with lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You only need to wield it once to appreciate the power of control.

card.name: Prophetic Prism
card.property: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To understand Ravnica, one must first understand how each guild contributes to its stability.

card.name: Razortip Whip
card.property: {1}, {T}: Razortip Whip deals 1 damage to target opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It no longer surprises me what shows up in our raid of a Rakdos revue."—Janik Bara, Wojek captain

card.name: Riot Gear
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+2. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any meeting between guilds requires proper equipment.

card.name: Simic Keyrune
card.property: {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. {G}{U}: Simic Keyrune becomes a 2/3 green and blue Crab artifact creature with hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Skyblinder Staff
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked by creatures with flying. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If bats are the only thing between me and a mountain of Orzhov coins, then I'm about to be a very rich thief."

card.name: Boros Guildgate
card.property: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter with merciful hearts. Exit with battle cries.

card.name: Breeding Pool
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.) As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Breeding Pool enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Uncharted depths. Unbounded hopes. Unfathomable mysteries.

card.name: Dimir Guildgate
card.property: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter and become a mastermind of spies, lies, and deception.

card.name: Godless Shrine
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.) As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Godless Shrine enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Gruul Guildgate
card.property: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter and leave the shackles of society behind.

card.name: Orzhov Guildgate
card.property: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter to find wealth, security, and eternal life . . . for just a small price up front.

card.name: Sacred Foundry
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.) As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Burning fervor and fearsome skill create a lethal beauty terrible to behold.

card.name: Simic Guildgate
card.property: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter and comprehend the perfection of orchestrated life.

card.name: Stomping Ground
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.) As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Stomping Ground enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Roots, ruins, and room to fight. All the comforts of home."—Domri Rade

card.name: Thespian's Stage
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land and gains this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Amid rumors of war, the third act of The Absolution of the Guildpact was quickly rewritten as a tragedy.

card.name: Watery Grave
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear that as we scurry after phantoms, the Dimir pull nine puppet strings."—Ral Zarek
